subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Eric Hinske had a bases-loaded triple and Dustin Pedroia hit a two-run double last night as host Boston’s bats came alive in a 7-3 victory against the Texas Rangers.
snippet: Eric Hinske had a bases-loaded triple and Dustin Pedroia hit a two-run double last night as host Boston’s bats came alive in a 7-3 victory against the Texas Rangers.
